sqlMap.select: SELECT TABLE_NM , TABLE_DC , TO_CHAR(RECENT_INIT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECENT_INIT_DT , RECENT_INIT_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE ESNTL_ID = RECENT_INIT_ID) RECENT_INIT_NM FROM TB_DTA_INIT
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_DTA_INIT SET RECENT_INIT_DT = SYSDATE , RECENT_INIT_ID = NVL(#RECENT_INIT_ID#, #INIT_ID#) WHERE TABLE_NM = #TABLE_NM#
sqlMap.delete:
DECLARE BEGIN INSERT INTO TB_MAIN_IMAGE_HIST ( IMAGE_SN , INIT_DT , IMAGE_NM , IMAGE_PATH , IMAGE_SIZE , SORT_ORDR , BEGIN_DE , END_DE , USE_AT , REGIST_ID , REGIST_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT , INIT_ID ) SELECT IMAGE_SN , SYSDATE , IMAGE_NM , IMAGE_PATH , IMAGE_SIZE , SORT_ORDR , BEGIN_DE , END_DE , USE_AT , REGIST_ID , REGIST_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT , #INIT_ID# FROM TB_MAIN_IMAGE;
DELETE FROM TB_MAIN_IMAGE; END;

DECLARE BEGIN INSERT INTO TB_TOUR_CL_HIST ( CL_CODE , INIT_DT , CL_NM , CL_NM_ENG , UPPER_CL_CODE , DC , DC_ENG , CL_SE , DELETE_AT , FILE_CODE , SORT_ORDR , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT , INIT_ID ) SELECT CL_CODE , SYSDATE , CL_NM , CL_NM_ENG , UPPER_CL_CODE , DC , DC_ENG , CL_SE , DELETE_AT , FILE_CODE , SORT_ORDR , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DT , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DT , #INIT_ID# FROM TB_TOUR_CL;
DELETE FROM TB_TOUR_CL; END;
